00077 void joReflect::_validate(bool for_real)
00078 {
00079         copy_info();
00080         input1().validate( for_real );
00081         set_out_channels( Mask_All );
00082         Format temp = info_.format();
00083         width = temp.width();
00084         info_.set( info_.x(), info_.y(), info_.r(), info_.t() );
00085 }

00087 void joReflect::_request(int x,int y,int r,int t, ChannelMask channels, int count)
00088 {
00089         input0().request(x,y,r,t, channels, count);
00090         input1().request(x,y,r,t, channels, count);
00091 }

00093 void joReflect::engine(int y, int x, int r, ChannelMask channels, Row& out)
00094 {
00096         out.range( 0, width );
00098         Row in1(x, r);
00099         Row in2(x, r);
00100 
00101         input0().get(y, x, r, channels, in1);
00102         input1().get(y, x, r, channels, in2);
00104         foreach (z, channels) 
00105         {
00107                 float* outPixelsR = out.writable(Chan_Red);
00108                 float* outPixelsG = out.writable(Chan_Green);
00109                 float* outPixelsB = out.writable(Chan_Blue);
00111                 for (int index = x; index < r; index++ ) 
00112                 {
00114                         Vector N( in1[Chan_Red][index], in1[Chan_Green][index],in1[Chan_Blue][index] );
00115                         Vector I( in2[Chan_Red][index], in2[Chan_Green][index], in2[Chan_Blue][index]);
00117                         if ( I.length() > 0.0001 )
00118                         {
00120                                 Vector R = I.reflection( N );
00122                                 if ( R.length() > 0.0001f )
00123                                         R.normalize();
00125                                 if( fresnel )
00126                                 {
00127                                         float fresnelfake = ( ( 1 - IOR ) / ( 1 + IOR ) ) * ( ( 1 - IOR ) / ( 1 + IOR ) );
00128                                         R = R * fresnelfake;
00129                                 }
00131                                 outPixelsR[index] = R.x;
00132                                 outPixelsG[index] = R.y;
00133                                 outPixelsB[index] = R.z;
00134 
00135                         } 
00136                         else
00137                         {
00138                                 outPixelsR[index] = 0.0f;
00139                                 outPixelsG[index] = 0.0f;
00140                                 outPixelsB[index] = 0.0f;
00141                         }
00142 
00143 
00144                         
00145                 }
00146                 
00147         }
00148 }
